name: constela
author: Iman and Dhyey
description: The year is 7331, and BadCorp rules the galaxy with it's omnipresent satelites. But recently a resistance movement led by a band of hackers calling themselves the OSIRIS has hacked into BadCorp systems, they have taken over the satelites and it is believed they are trying to send a message across the galaxy...\.Can humanity _see_ their message?
